name: General Motors Company
goal: General Motors is the largest automotive manufacturer in the United States. Although GM does not have a direct presence currently in the EU, it does have an interest in EU policies. Our brands include Chevrolet, Cadillac, Buick, GMC. As a global concern, we have a presence in 134 countries in the world, and manufacture in 54 of those.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: GM follows a range of EU/EC policies including: CO2 Post 2020, WLTP and RDE/air quality, autonomous vehicles, alternative powertrains, artificial intelligence & cybersecurity.
